scripts.watch: (cd contracts && find . -name '*.cairo' | entr poetry run starknet-compile zorro.cairo)
scripts.//: use this to run tests after contract code has changed.
caches test fixtures for use by the `test:cached` command
quickly rerun tests using cached contract fixtures
scripts.test:cached: (cd contracts && poetry run pytest -n auto -s -W ignore::DeprecationWarning ../test/test.py)
scripts.launch: yarn compile && yarn deploy && git add deployments/ && git add starknet-artifacts/
